node.title: PM's performance at COP26 behind Allegra Spender's tilt at seat of Wentworth
node.description: The realisation that Scott Morrison was "never going to get there" at the climate conference in Glasgow was the tipping point for Carla Zampatti's daughter to run in next year's federal election.
node.content:
["A high-profile independent running for the federal Sydney seat of Wentworth\u00a0says the Prime Minister's performance at the recent climate change conference in Glasgow motivated her to enter the race.", "Businesswoman and renewable energy advocate\u00a0Allegra Spender,\u00a0the daughter of late fashion designer Carla Zampatti and former Liberal MP John Spender,\u00a0will run as an independent for the blue-ribbon, eastern-suburbs seat in\u00a0next year's election.", "The seat is currently held by Liberal MP Dave Sharma\u00a0with a margin of 1.3 per cent.", "Ms Spender decided to run after what she said was the federal government's failure to deal with climate change.", "\"I decided to run really about climate, integrity and the economy,\" she said.", "\"We are not doing enough on climate and that is having a big impact on our economy and our environmental future.\"", "", "
Ms Spender (left)\u00a0says her campaign will focus on climate change,\u00a0integrity and the economy.(AAP: Bianca De Marchi)
", "She said her moment came when she saw Prime Minister Scott Morrison on the world stage.", "\"It was really watching COP26 and just realising that Scott Morrison and the team were never going to get there,\" she said.", "\"It is the next 10 years that are really going to make a difference, both for the economy but also for the climate.", "\"That was really clear in COP26 that Australia was an absolute laggard in terms of what we signed up to \u2014 and we need to move faster.\"", "
Blue-ribbon background
", "Ms Spender said even though her father\u00a0was a former Liberal MP for the federal seat of North Sydney and a diplomat, he supported\u00a0her independent candidacy.", "\"My dad was a Liberal MP but he is 100 per cent behind me,\" she said.", "", "
The daughter of fashion designer Carla Zampatti, who died in April, says her Liberal father backs her decision.(Instagram: Bianca Spender)
", "She also said she was\u00a0optimistic about her chances.", "\"Wentworth has shown it is willing to elect an independent when it elected Kerryn Phelps and it is a very marginal seat,\" she said.", "\"I think the frustration of the people I talk to in Wentworth is real \u2014 and it is about climate, and it is about the economy, and it is about trust in our politicians.", "\"I strongly believe business and the environment can work together.\""]
